about.description:
The API based on Pablo Bleyer Kocik’s d2xx extension.

Version 1.1.0 is compatible with Python 3. Please ensure you have FTDI
drivers installed or available where the linker looks for shared libraries
(e.g., PATH on windows, LD_LIBRARY_PATH or standard library directories
on Linux)
about.summary: ftd2xx is a simple python wrapper around the D2XX DLL from FTDI using ctypes.

name: ftd2xx
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "ftd2xx" %}
{% set version = "1.1.1" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 8eb6729fba576eec2f678b83dcad5ee52db5bd5fc71158c15f978ba5a02d9103

build:
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"

requirements:
  build:
    - m2-patch  # [win]
  host:
    - python
    - pip
  run:
    - python
    - future
    - pywin32  # [win]

# Tests done in run_test.py

about:
  home: https://github.com/snmishra/ftd2xx/blob/master/LICENSE
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'ftd2xx is a simple python wrapper around the D2XX DLL from FTDI using ctypes.'

  description: |
    The API based on Pablo Bleyer Kocik’s d2xx extension.

    Version 1.1.0 is compatible with Python 3. Please ensure you have FTDI
    drivers installed or available where the linker looks for shared libraries
    (e.g., PATH on windows, LD_LIBRARY_PATH or standard library directories
    on Linux)

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - hmaarrfk
